website_summaries.verdict: Allows for editorial sessions with flexible angles and lighting.
pros: Works especially well in contained environments, providing professional looking results
We love the dramatic before and after pictures
Easy to plug in and get going

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I’m not as impressed with this product as I had expected. The light is good but the holder can’t support the weight of my iPhone 7plus, which is disappointing because the product description specifically states it’s compatible to the iPhone 7 Plus. My phone barely fits into the holder and it doesn’t look like it’s in there very securely either...not really sure that I trust this product for the long term. So far, it’s just been ok, but I’ll definitely be replacing it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny427

customer_reviews.title: DOES AS PROMISED
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so convenient! Can film videos with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my little studio!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iPhone & lighting holder to use for recording myself with Guitar and vocals. Camera and lighting have been a problem, but this economical device solves that problem for my little recording studio! It’s perfect for my use and low cost is easily in the budget! The lighting options are great and the camera AKA iPhone positioning works great too.
customer_reviews.author: sjbrn1Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning vlogger on youtube and this back light works perfectly for my space and phone. The price is amazing and quality great. The lights neck adjust in all directions and has very durable materials. If you are on a budget but still want great quality, please buy. I havent posted with it yet, but tried it and should post in a few days. Check me out on youtube at Vintage Sista.
customer_reviews.author: roshanda roberts

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light!!!!!! Perfect🤩
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo satisfied The item was shipped to me in two days with my prime membership came properly boxed & secured nothing was missing except for directions which it’s pretty self-explanatory plug in go the item is a good quality I am totally content with my purchase eventually wanting to get a full size ring light but not so far advance in my MUA skills so I wanted to get a little something to help with lighting for my make up vanity. It has dimmer settings three different shades of lighting I am completely satisfied for the amount that I spent very affordable awesome Quality!!! Recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Tecie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to do Facebook live videos, just got the courage to do them. Used it 2 times and the light has already stopped working, very disappointed. Not worth the money. would have given it 0 stars if I could have.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley S.

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting, came with a broken wire
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, and for a bit it just wouldn't turn on, and then it came on suddenly when I went to unplug it, and then turns off and on when I move the wire. So the wire seems to be broken or otherwise defective. I'd like to see about exchanging, and then testing how long it lasts, because some of the other reviews said it breaks after a month. My initial impression is this is not super sturdy, but it *is* only $20.
customer_reviews.author: Valory

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality clip
customer_reviews.text: **update** 7/4 after about a dozen times of using the clip to hold my cellphone it broke into small pieces. The plastic is not strong enough to support the retractable rods. Cannot find replacement pieces for the holder clip. ........ Great product, no instructions though. Figured it out after a few minutes of playing with it. Has different light shades and settings. works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bnlugenbeel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a good product
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived exactly as advertised. It's pretty cool - and works how it's supposed to. It's a tremendous value for the price. My iPhone X fits well in the holder, and the light has several different settings, which I'm sure will be helpful the more I use this. At present, I'm going to use this item for teaching English via WeChat, but I think there are a lot of ways this holder could be used - I can see using the phone holder to keep my phone at a convenient angle at my desk, or anywhere. I'm very satisfied with this purchase, and definitely recommend the seller and the item.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily in my online classroom and I've used it to take photos and film videos as well. It's flexible and so easy to use. The only thing is the power cable is a little short, so keep in mind if you are not using the USB port to a computer (what I do), you'll need access to a close wall outlet or an extension cable.
customer_reviews.author: K_Stegosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: This item hold my phone very well and the idea is great however, the light gets so hot it shuts off after 6 minutes. I notice it only happens with the white light setting so I will assume that the middle white light setting is not LED but you probably dont want to use that setting anyway as it is so bright, you wouldn't even be able to complete a live stream with that in your face. The first and third light setting work perfectly fine. All in all I like it. Its sturdy, holds my phone well, adjusts well. Can't really ask for more for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy on the move

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is really flexible so you can position the lighting and the phone stand any way you desire. The light has different modes to suit all of my needs for my online videos AND my customers are raving about how clearly they can see my face, skincare, and makeup with my new lighting and angles. PLUS it has a USB connection so you can plug it in to anything you already have! Perfect for anyone who does their business through online videos as well as anyone just playing around with selfies! I can't rave about this enough😃
customer_reviews.author: Miche33

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Ring light not terribly bright
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions. It's okay, but the light is definitely not as bright as I'd like it to be and it's pretty hard to get my iPhone 6 into the holder. My bad that I didn't notice it doesn't have a regular plug adapter - just one more thing to find a port to plug it into my laptop. I'm not using it for selfies - don't do those - but for taking photos and maybe a short video of my cards/projects for my website - I'm a Stampin' Up! Demonstrator.(papercrafting).
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Faulty.  Haven't been able to use it once.  :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought it about a month ago, but this is the first time I'm trying to use it, and the top two buttons won't work! This means that the light won't even turn on. It's plugged it in, and the bottom two buttons are lit up blue, but the top two buttons aren't lit up at all. Seems to be faulty. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TD_2323

customer_reviews.title: I am so pissed this product was bought 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so pissed this product was bought 3 months ago. its cute and all but it started to have a glitch. and now its shut off and blinks. i have never moved it from its spot! I am just done
customer_reviews.author: M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for streaming. Instead of getting a huge ring light I went ahead and did some sloppy tape work just to see if it would work with my logitech webcam and it did. The various lighting modes and brightness are awesome and for the price it's painless!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy G

customer_reviews.title: This is way more incredible than I expected. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This is way more incredible than I expected. It holds my iPhone 6 and also the iPhone X I use for work. The ring light has three shade settings and gets very bright. I've had no trouble adjusting either arm to get the desired shot. This has been instrumental in recording our processes at work. The quality of this was really impressive for the price point, as I've seen flimsy ring lights for cell phones go for about as much.
customer_reviews.author: H&J Mads

customer_reviews.title: This thing was horrible! From the time I set it up the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was horrible! From the time I set it up the dimmer did not work properly. It would get stuck on high and I would have to shut it off completely to get to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Joy G.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The clip isn’t very strong. Would slip off of counters and things I’d try to clip it to. And the clip is easily bent, once bent you can’t use this product any more. Poor quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Medeka M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for beginners or even travel. Lights are bright and I like that fact you can chose from the 3 shades of lighting. Easily clips onto a table. Only problem I have is I have to take my phone case off because my phone dosent fit into the phone slot (I have a galaxy s9)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started 'going live' on social media for my business and this is a great tool if you don't want to invest much. The ring light has so many different settings from natural day light to blue hues that you can find the best lighting for you. And the phone and light actually stay put. The clamp has padding so even clipping this to my soft pine dresser, it doesn't scratch it up or damage it in anyway. Highly recommended to all the selfie queens and makeup artists.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a small package!!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m actually really happy I bought this light ring. Not only because also has the phone holder, but also because it delivers the same quality as those giant LED light rings at a waaaaay more affordable price. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because the buttons that turn on and off the light and adjust brightness and color do light up, but two of my buttons lightings don’t work. Other than that it’s a great buy for those looking for quality lighting on a budget. This is worth the money. In the pictures provided, I do have the brightness on the lowest setting, but trust me this thing can be blinding on its highest.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Truly just a selfie light for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Truly just a selfie light for a cell phone. Don't expect the kind of light you'd need to put quality YT / Twitch vids. Buy the full size light.
customer_reviews.author: captaingnome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting solution for LIVE videos.
customer_reviews.text: I love the various lighting options. They can be adjusted to accommodate or replace existing lighting. The cord is long enough that you don't have to be too close to an outlet or PC to power the light. The clip is nice because it attaches to anything, but I did have to find something with enough width to make it hold securely. Once I found something wide enough, the holder stayed in place perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job and then some
customer_reviews.text: WYSIWYG, and this was super easy to set up and start using. My only complaint is that just two days ago, after only a few weeks of use, the tightening knob on the holder part snapped, so it doesn't hold the phone in place as tight. Hopefully it's an easy remedy, but I'm still making it work until I get a tripod and upgraded camera.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Sneyd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality for picture taking from your phone is amazing!!! Love how durable this product has been. It definitely has a great bang for it’s buck. Only downfall you need a long cord because it has to be attached to the socket in the wall and can make it difficult to move around to take pictures. Only downside to it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Photo Booth!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with a wireless remote shutter button for a self service photo booth. Turned out to be a big hit! Took me a while to figure out how to attach the cell phone holder to the ball. If I recall, I think I just had to apply more pressure than I initially thought (there were no assembly instructions). I needed something to clamp the assembly to and attached it to a stapler in order to have a "base." That worked out fine. Not once did anyone turnover the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Amazony

customer_reviews.title: Ok, for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This was great.... For a few weeks. Now I'll set my phone in it and it doesn't stay up, it starts bending over and down. Also, the lights sometimes don't respond to the remote unless you unplug it and plug it back in. Going to look for a different one. Edit:seller contacted for a refund/ exchange on what they called 'defective product' changed to 4 star .
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the overall quality. The lighting allows for a nice range of brightness and tones. I like this type of positioning technology as it is unlimited in how you can position things. I feel like I received a great value. I'm playing with pod/vidcasting. This could also be a kewl - quick and portable mobile setup with a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: David 'Dancing Tree' Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great For Live Bloggers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I bought it just to make going live easier in my hotel room and it makes me look like a pro. I am so happy! Easy to set up. It was a little bulkier that I had expected, but I after one use I knew I wanted to keep it. My sister and friends were amazed at how good my live stream went.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these to beauty vloggers who are starting out
customer_reviews.text: These things are extremely bright. I use mine on the second to lowest setting and they still blind me. I would recommend these to beauty vloggers who are starting out, these are so nice. The clamp is really strong, and the phone holder is a good add on. They have a lot of settings, so you can adjust what the light looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Awww... It broke on me.
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it broke at the phone holder part week after opening, I'm very delicate with things I use for business so I wish this was made a bit stronger no way it broke from wear and tear. But I will admit great concept and I loved it while I had it and it was functional.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: amazing piece of kit for any youtuber!
customer_reviews.text: i use this for all of my youtube videos, it hold the camera and has excellent lighting , MrPOPSZILLA on youtube go look for yourself! it is awesome, even yankee uses this setup!
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Clamp is so small that it won’t attach to anything. Also the whole rig is pretty heavy so you HAVE to attach it to something sturdy. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M

customer_reviews.title: Good Till It Burns Out
customer_reviews.text: I received this and it was amazing. Very easy to use and you can clip it wherever. I loved that you could switch through the lighting options and could adjust how bright you want them. Well, this past week I was doing my eyebrows and it just turned off. It smelled like burnt plastic and the plug was extreamly hot...IT NEVER TURNED BACK ON AGAIN. Honestly, it’s a great product but doesn’t last. There should be a warning that you should have it ON longer than 30-40 min because it will burn. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Light keeps on turning off
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased after returning the first one due to the phone holder broke. The second one has also the same issue as the first that the light keeps on turning off every few minutes! This is very annoyed especially if you’re doing a live show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights broken within 2 days, maybe manufacturer problem?
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 2 days of use. Clipped it on table and barely moved it. Only touched the remote which is attached to power cable. If seller contacts me and can seem to replace light I will gladly be happy. Two days and the lights will not turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and works great. Lighting is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. Came quickly and works great. Lighting is amazing. For the first week i was able to change the settings and all that but now the button doesn't work. My light comes on once plugged into an adapter but I am unable to turn it off or switch settings
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: B-Land Cell Phone Holder - Do NOT Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even want to give this a 1 start. I had no choice. It should get ZERO star. Got it as a 2018 Christmas gift. Just tried it today (1/1/2019). Did not and could not hold up any cell phones (Tried 3 cell phones). PERIOD! Ugh! I got a video too and will see if I can load the video. But if you are looking to buy this, I recommend DO NOT BUY it. That's my review with my experience with this product. I hope I can get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: smnthyg

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. I used this for streaming on Twitch(used to meaning I don't stream anymore), and it worked wonderfully with my Logitech C920. Having the option to switch between warm and cool lighting profiles is a nice touch to the product. Adjusting the limbs are easy too, and stay in place without that weird springiness you get from other adjustable lamps. I don't use the phone attachment portion, but I tested it once, and it was capable of holding an iPhone 7 up with no issue. The clamp for it is firm and has not slipped or lost its grip since being put into place.
customer_reviews.author: John Arn

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy
customer_reviews.text: This light is pretty fantastic. I bought it as a substitute ring light for my DSLR camera and have used it for lighting things on a table so far. Pretty great. It has 3 settings and different brightness intensity. I even received emails from the seller informing of shipping and making sure I got the item. I love this and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Cannot adjust brightness
customer_reviews.text: While this does exactly what I want it to do and the lighting is excellent, I cannot adjust brightness. If I do, the controls stop working and I cannot change the light settings whatsoever. I must unplug. Brightness level cannot be adjusted, so I cannot give this more than 3 stars. I will probably be returning even though I really wanted to love it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Blackshear

customer_reviews.title: The best mobile video set up for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this holder/light combo. I take a lot of mobile videos and it works perfectly for me. I clip it to everything and use my portable battery pack to power the light when needed. I've had it over a year now and even holds the new large phones!
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.text: There are lights similar to these on stands going for over a hundred dollars. I don't see how they could be any better than this product. The light dims and brightens, and all together is a very well made product. I will be recommending this to all my colleagues and beauty blogger friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light to have and the holder for my cell phone works great too, but the clamp is not convenient as it is difficult to keep it clipped somewhere and the clip angle makes it difficult to even find a place to clip it without it sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: TaVierre_

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Plug It In
customer_reviews.text: This thing shorted out a room in my house. I narrowed it down to this piece of equipment that was plugged in. It started glowing on and off. Too bad I was out of the return window when my wife used it.
customer_reviews.author: Curty

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenience! I love that I can plug it into My laptop computer or a wall outlet. It’s super flexible and has shown no signs of use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good idea, but my phone does an awful lot of wobbling. I'm still toying around with it to see if I can better stabilize it and also use it at the same time. It looks exactly as expected, I just hoped it would be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Forever

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting sucky clip for your phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love the light on this awesome. The clip is so durable. What I did not like on this was the clip where you can place your phone. Very disappointed. It did not even hold up my phone it dropped down and it was so hard to place my phone in the clip. I have Iphone plus and I feels like it does not work for that phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She loves it. Easy to use, great amount of light. She wants another one so she can keep one at home and take one with her when she is on the go. Will be ordering another for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use and set up. Big help when taking pics of my manicures/nail art. I would have liked a brighter light ring to avoid using my other lamps but I do like the different light temperature settings.
customer_reviews.author: Riqueña

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. Only problem was after using it twice I went to put it away and tried unplugging it and the usb part broke. It pulled right out of the USB adapter. I am pretty sad.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have a note 8, and it seems too heavy for holder. It fits but the options for how it's going to hold the device are limited. The phone weighs it down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Will Find Uses For This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this ring light! The adjustable brightness paired with the three variations of light tones make this incredibly versatile and makes for incredible selfies. If you're a vlogger, this couldn't be easier. It clips to almost anything and has a super strong grip for your phone. I love the USB power! 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great for recording
customer_reviews.text: I’m so late with this review I honestly forgot but I bought this in 2017 and I still use it to this day and it’s July 29, 2019. My kids did a little damage to it lol but it still is very durable works and can be used anywhere is my fav part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Incredible lighting for the price. I love the flexible arms, that you can adjust the brightness and clip for table. Only thing that could make it better is if the flexible arm for the phone holder was longer as I like to shoot my videos from a higher angle.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie5690

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The lighting on this is awesome however if you have a larger phone such as iPhone 8 plus it's a little heavy and will sink down and not stay however it works excellent for smaller phones I would just make sure you're going to use this often before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DFrankdez

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the lighting
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but, I give this 3 stars because I’m not sure if I got a defective device...The lighting doesn’t let me go brighter ...once I press the + plus button it goes back to the first setting . That’s the only problem I have with this device, but other than that it holds well my iPhone and it has 3 different lighting to choose from. Update: Now I don’t have lighting my son just broke the usb part 😭🙁 I’m so upset now I guess it back to natural lighting when I record my makeup tutorials
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this sturdy contraption
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this sturdy contraption. I purchased this to do timelapse videos of lettering but am finding the phone cord length isn't long enough to do a large overview video without having to find something up high to attach it to. The cords are very sturdy, metal and the light is awesome! Great for reading, late night painting, or ambiance for the room. I recommend for those wanting a general light and phone combo. If you're looking to do timelapse videos etc from above...make sure you have something up high to clip it onto.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ward

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great concept and I love the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great concept and I love the product. However, the clamp does not work well for every angle If it is up on a frame or mirror for example, it slides because the grip is not very strong. There should be more grip within the clamp itself. The adjustable metal that bends also does not maintain it's full shape all of the time. Ideally, I would prefer a model that held where I put it versus fight it while trying to do live videos etc.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Vahle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! I’m a cosplayer & photoshoots are very expensive; so this is like a nessecity for absolutely anyone that loves taking pictures. This has saved me on many occasions. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best thing I’ve purchased for my home vlog. Easy to use, works wonders and is affordable. It really helps make my videos that much better and more professional
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I needed better lighting for doing makeup videos! I love this!!! Hands free and the ability to adjust the lighting is great!!! Definitely wish I had bought one of these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: dvspinay

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for very long
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a couple of months, and already it has stopped working! I have to unplug it to shut if off. Plug it back in and it will turn on, sometimes it will change settings too, but then I have to unplug it again to shut if off. This is very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: So the light on this gets bright which is great and needed but then when attaching the phone it’s hard to keep it in place. But it works well enough to get what I need out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for a Diva Ring Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is perfecf to attach onto my desk. It keeps me from having to prop up my phone in odd places or holding it to get decent lighting. I can plug it into my computer with the usb or into a charging base and plug it into an outlet. I love that it allows you to change the light settings (from bright white to a yellowish) also you control the dimmer. Its definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great stuff! It can hold my iPhone pretty stable. The light is bright enough but not too glare. With this one, I don’t need to hold the phone by myself, at same time I don’t need to turn on my table lamp. It’s so convenient
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavan for a youtuber
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS THING!!! Im a youtuber and I have actually been waiting to film a review on this product but I’m waiting on a few thrings on amazon to come in first. This has surpassed my expectations and worth the money. So far so good. I pray that the lights last a good while so I wont have to replace it too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Broxton

customer_reviews.title: great for everyday as well as photos
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time next to my chair to hold my phone while I follow an art project using the light.
customer_reviews.author: sarah cay

customer_reviews.title: I am looking for a different product
customer_reviews.text: Lighting causes washout during lives. Clip is too bulky so if your desk/vanity is meant to sit flush against the wall this will be inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the price. I purchased it after seeing a friend use it, and didn't know it had the summer or warm and cool settings until I received it. Definitely recommend for anyone starting out that needs a good inexpensive option.
customer_reviews.author: brandizzle

customer_reviews.title: I like this but I wish it had a power supply ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I wish it had a power supply to plug into an outlet instead of just a computer port. I do see that there may be problems in holding my phone and not dropping it, but all in all, I think it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Bright and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these i use them for my art work and because i getting old n its harde n harder to see...lol lights ARE super bright on on both of them and i think i need 3 more my husband said no i didnt so i guess i dont get more...lol
customer_reviews.author: Sir Crawford's sub/wife

customer_reviews.title: A year and 1 month later, it started flickering
customer_reviews.text: And now it's dead. If you need lighting for more than a year, look someplace else.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous Consumption

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it while it last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use for my social media videos and webinars. After only using it a couple of times the handle that holds my phone broke, therefor i am unable to use it for its intended purposes. I enjoyed using it initially now it really doesnt serve much of a purpose, except as an additional ring light for my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if this had a remote to start and stop ...
customer_reviews.text: so far this has served its purpose. It is heavy so be mindful of where you attach it. Would be great if this had a remote to start and stop video for business use. The light itself was great and definitely makes a difference in quality of photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: GJP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed the product with the light switch covers off of it. I had to manually put on the cover and in the process the wires completely broke off without really touching it at all. It was not secure enough to stay together with just some light handling. Sad that I unboxed it much later than purchased so I couldn’t get a refund. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble even for me lol!! Self explanatory and does what I need it to. Light is a good brightness. Got it on sale so it was worth the 10 bucks
customer_reviews.author: michelle schefe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for online facebook live jewelry sales. this works wonderful. however always move with the arms, my phone holder has broke twice while adjusting. so keep super glue handy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a way to easily record videos this is it! I use it for my social media and it works fabulous every time. I love the different lighting options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting for my selfies and videos for online
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting for my selfies and videos for online! I do wish the clip to hold the phone was bigger to accommodate my Samsun Galaxy with the case and popsocket on it, but other than that it is awesome! I love the light and the fact that it has 3 settings, that can each be adjusted to brighter or dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in good time and I use it all the time. The holder for the phone was a little bit hard to get set up but my boyfriend helped with it and didn't have an issue figuring it out. Haha probably just user error. It's a great light with different options of brightness. I use it all the time and have had no issues. I am glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: ... the hold that holds the cell very upset I liked it but
customer_reviews.text: 2 nd time to use it and it broke the hold that holds the cell very upset I liked it but upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hulgan

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn't work, out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Light doesn't work. Clamp (for desktop) is average, at best. Clamp for device is decent. Would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TheWayISeeIt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was going to be incredible. Light worked well. Held phone well. Seemed sturdy. Went to turn it on and it’s not working. The light has stopped working. It has not been moved, or jostled. The portion with buttons still lights up but the light itself does not work. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dezarae J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Happy with the Selfie Ring Light
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Happy with the Selfie Ring Light. The only complaint is that the clamp is ridiculously hard to push open,and the whole set up is very heavy, and tends to slump to one side after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dht

customer_reviews.title: I also love that the light has so many options
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help with an online demonstrations... that I could move my phone up and then face down.. it works amazingly well! I also love that the light has so many options... lighter, brighter, softer etc. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: HMagnusson

customer_reviews.title: Not a very durable product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time using the ring light and I tried to adjust where the light was sitting and the ring bent off the pole and then would only work as yellow light, then when I try to move it again it popped off and now will not turn on at all. So basically now have a cell phone holder with a useless light on it. And I am past my time for return so basically I just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Goveia

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for going live! I didn't realize I would need a power source but this works off a USB so I was able to use my Mophie charger to power it. Really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cerney

customer_reviews.title: While I like the circle light
customer_reviews.text: While I like the circle light. The bendable arm does not hold up. I can not use this to focus on anything I want to record because the weight of the phone causes it to fall. They should've given the arm that holds the phone more structure. Now I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this every day. Maybe 1-2 times a week and I've only had it for not even 2 months and the light snapped off while adjusting it and the clamp already has a fracture in the metal. Also always took a lot of adjusting because my phone would slip and would seem too heavy for the arm even without the case on and it's just an S8, nothing bulky.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service on this item was exceptional. The product is very good quality, heavy, well made. I’m impressed by the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and broke easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 8 months. I felt that it was always hard to use because the prongs were never sturdy enough to hold up my phone. It recently broke when nothing was done to it. It won't change light settings anymore. I think the value is comparable to the price. Invest in a nicer ring light if you don't want to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great value
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly impressed with the quality and sturdiness of the light and holder. They’re made of metal and work beautifully for the live FB and YouTube videos I bought it for!
customer_reviews.author: N. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light and it’s different lighting effects. You can plug in to an USB port and there you have it, good lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second because the first one I had light wouldn’t cut on I set up a return and instantly they sent me a new and it came and was as perfect as I thought it would be !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this Ring light
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ring light! I sell Lipsense and this is great for taking selfies! I love it so much that I bought one for one of my downlines as a gift for her as well! Takes great pics and is great for doing videos as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t bright at all
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the light to get any brighter than a dim light. Very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lighting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light! I went out on a limb and purchased this, in hopes that it would be bright enough to use for applying makeup. This is absolutely great if you can’t afford a big fancy light! It has settings you can adjust and it gets quite bright. I also tried it out for its intended purpose and it makes pictures look fantastic! I would highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Makara Mace

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Even holds my huge smartphone. The light is bright and beautiful. I've only used it a few times so if my review changes I will update it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai
